sen.e: Remarks
Remarks
Remarks

sen.j: 南山城村（みなみやましろむら）は、京都府南東端に位置する、京都府唯一の村である。
sen.e: Minamiyamashiro-mura located at the southeast end of Kyoto Prefecture is the only one village in Kyoto Prefecture.
Minamiyamashiro-mura is located at the southeast end of Kyoto Prefecture and is the only village in Kyoto Prefecture.
Minamiyamashiro-mura is located at the southeast end of Kyoto Prefecture and is the only village in Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 南は奈良県、北は滋賀県、東は三重県に隣接している。
sen.e: It is adjacent to Nara Prefecture on the south, to Shiga Prefecture on the north, and to Mie Prefecture on the east.
It is adjacent to Nara Prefecture on the south, to Shiga Prefecture on the north, and to Mie Prefecture on the east.
It is adjacent to Nara Prefecture on the south, to Shiga Prefecture on the north, and to Mie Prefecture on the east.

sen.j: 河川：木津川 (京都府)、名張川
sen.e: River: Kizu-kawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) and Nabari-gawa River
River: Kizu-kawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) and Nabari-gawa River
River: Kizu-kawa River (Kyoto Prefecture) and Nabari-gawa River

History

History

sen.j: 4月1日、大河原村と高山村が合併して南山城村が誕生した。
sen.e: April 1 - Formed Minamiyamashiro-mura through merger between Okawara-mura and Takayama-mura
April 1 - Formed Minamiyamashiro-mura through a merger between Okawara-mura and Takayama-mura

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 三重県道・奈良県道・京都府道82号上野南山城線
sen.e: Mie Prefectural Road, Nara Prefectural Road, and Ueno-Minamiyamashiro Line of Kyoto Prefectural Road No. 82
Mie Prefectural Road, Nara Prefectural Road, and Ueno-Minamiyamashiro Line of Kyoto Prefectural Road No. 82
Ueno-Minamiyamashiro Line of Mie Prefectural Route, Nara Prefectural Route, and Kyoto Prefectural Route 82
sen.cmt: これら３つの県道（府道）が上野南山城線のようですので、このようにしました。

sen.j: 奈良県道・京都府道753号月ヶ瀬今山線
sen.e: Nara Prefectural Road, and Tsukigase-Imayama Line of Kyoto Prefectural Road No. 753
Nara Prefectural Road, and Tsukigase-Imayama Line of Kyoto Prefectural Road No. 753
Tsukigase-Imayama Line of Nara Prefectural Route and Kyoto Prefectural Route 753
sen.cmt: これら２つの県道（府道）が月ヶ瀬今山線のようですので、このようにしました。

sen.j: 南山城村の市外局番は全域0743(市内局番は95、奈良第2MA)。
sen.e: The area code applied to the whole area of Minamiyamashiro-mura is 0743 (local number is 95; Nara Daini MA).
The area code, 0743, applies to the whole area of Minamiyamashiro-mura (local number is 95; Nara Daini MA).
The area code, 0743, applies to the whole area of Minamiyamashiro-mura (local number is 95; Nara Second Message Area).
sen.cmt: 奈良第2MA→Nara Second Message Areaとしました。

sen.j: 笠置町および生駒市、天理市、大和郡山市、山添村、奈良市(旧月ヶ瀬村、都祁村)、大阪府四條畷市(田原台地区、生駒局管内)へは市内局番から通話できる。
sen.e: A local call is available to Kasagi-cho, Ikoma City, Tenri City, Yamatokoriyama City, Yamazoe-mura, Nara City (formerly Tsukigase-mura and Tsuge-mura), and Shijonawate City (Tawaradai area and area under the control of Ikoma telephone station) in Osaka Prefecture.

Kasagi-cho, Ikoma City, Tenri City, Yamatokoriyama City, Yamazoe-mura, Nara City (formerly Tsukigase-mura and Tsuge-mura), and Shijonawate City (Tawaradai area and area under the control of Ikoma telephone station) in Osaka Prefecture are all designated as local calls.

Kasagi-cho, Ikoma City, Tenri City, Yamatokoriyama City, Yamazoe-mura, Nara City (formerly Tsukigase-mura and Tsuge-mura), and Shijonawate City (Tawaradai area and area under the control of Ikoma telephone station) in Osaka Prefecture are all designated as local calls.

sen.j: また、奈良市の大部分を占める市外局番0742(奈良第1MA)のエリアへは市内料金が適用され(但し市外局番は必要)、奈良県内(吉野郡など)へは県内通話となるが、笠置町を除く京都府域への通話は県外通話となる。
sen.e: A local call rate is applied to a call to the area subject to the area code of 0742 (under the control of Nara Daiichi MA) used in the most part of Nara City (however, the dialing of area code is required), and a call to areas (Yoshino-gun, etc.) within Nara Prefecture is regarded as a call within the prefecture, but a call to areas in Kyoto Prefecture, except for Kasagi-cho, is regarded as a call to the outside of the prefecture.

Local call rates are applied to calls to areas which are designated as having the area code of 0742 (under the control of Nara Daiichi MA) used in most of Nara City (however, area code must also be diealed), and calls to areas (Yoshino-gun, etc.) within Nara Prefecture are considered calls made within the prefecture, while calls to areas in Kyoto Prefecture, except for Kasagi-cho, are considered as calls placed to an area outside of the prefecture.

Local call rates are applied to calls to areas which are designated as having the area code of 0742 (under the control of Nara First Message Area) used in most of Nara City (however, area code must also be dialed), and calls to areas (Yoshino-gun, etc.) within Nara Prefecture are considered calls made within the prefecture, while calls to areas in Kyoto Prefecture, except for Kasagi-cho, are considered as calls placed to an area outside of the prefecture.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。奈良第1MA→Nara First Message Area としました。
